## 🗒️ ɴᴇᴄᴇssᴀʀʏ ᴠᴀʀs

☞ `API_HASH` - Get your API_HASH from [my.telegram.org](https://my.telegram.org/apps)<br>
☞ `BOT_TOKEN` - Get your BOT_TOKEN from [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather)<br>
